vocabInfos.mediumDef:
A man living at the time of the Patriarchs, first mentioned at Gen.10.26;
son of: Joktan (H3355);
brother of: Almodad (H0486), Sheleph (H8026), Jerah (H3392), Hadoram (H1913A), Uzal (H0187), Diklah (H1853), Obal (H5745), Abimael (H0039), Sheba (H7614H), Ophir (H0211), Havilah (H2341I) and Jobab (H3103)
§ Hazarmaveth = "village of death"
n pr m
the 3rd in order of the sons of Joktan
vocabInfos._es_Definition: hijo de Joctán; descendiente de Sem
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
薩瑪非 这个字在希伯來文的意思是 "死亡村莊"
陽性專有名詞
約坍的第三個兒子
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
萨玛非 这个字在希伯来文的意思是 "死亡村庄"
阳性专有名词
约坍的第三个儿子
